prompts.raw:
Analyze this request and suggest 1-5 most relevant agents.

REQUEST: {{user_request}}

AGENTS:
- api-designer: Expert in RESTful API design, GraphQL, API documentation, versioning, and best practices for scalable API architectures
- aws-cloud-specialist: PROACTIVE AWS cloud specialist - auto-engages for AWS services, CloudFormation, Lambda, ECS, RDS, S3, IAM, CloudWatch. Validates via Context7 MCP and WebFetch
- backend-developer: Backend development specialist focused on server-side logic, API design, database integration, and scalable system architecture
- claude-specialist: Expert in Claude AI API, Anthropic SDKs, prompt engineering, and AI integration best practices
- code-reviewer: Systematic code review specialist analyzing code quality, best practices, security, performance, and maintainability
- context-manager: Context window optimization specialist managing token usage, compaction strategies, and conversation efficiency
- datadog-specialist: PROACTIVE Datadog and observability specialist - auto-engages for Datadog, OpenTelemetry, StatsD, DogStatsD, ddtrace, APM, distributed tracing, metrics collection, log aggregation, observability, monitoring. Validates via Context7 MCP and WebFetch
- debugger: Debugging specialist skilled in troubleshooting, error analysis, diagnostic techniques, and systematic problem resolution
- development-orchestrator: PROACTIVE orchestrator for complex multi-phase development workflows requiring 3+ specialized agents with sequential dependencies and quality gates
- django-developer: Django development specialist with expertise in Django REST Framework, ORM, migrations, and Django best practices
- documentation-engineer: Technical documentation specialist creating clear, comprehensive documentation including API docs, guides, and technical writing
- eventsourcing-expert: Expert in Python eventsourcing library. Use proactively when working with event sourcing patterns, aggregates, domain events, event stores, projections, or when eventsourcing library is mentioned
- github-installation-specialist: PROACTIVE GitHub Apps specialist - auto-engages for GitHub App development, installation authentication, GitHub API integration, webhook handling, and GitHub Apps best practices
- kubernetes-specialist: Kubernetes specialist expert in container orchestration, deployments, services, scaling, and Kubernetes ecosystem tools
- microservices-architect: Microservices architecture specialist designing distributed systems, service boundaries, inter-service communication, and resilience patterns
- postgres-pro: Expert PostgreSQL specialist mastering database administration, performance optimization, and high availability
- promptfoo-specialist: PROACTIVE promptfoo specialist for LLM testing, prompt evaluation, red teaming, and AI quality assurance
- python-pro: Python development specialist with deep expertise in Python best practices, patterns, standard library, and ecosystem
- qa-expert: Quality assurance specialist focused on testing strategies, quality metrics, and comprehensive QA processes
- research-analyst: PROACTIVE research analyst - auto-engages for documentation lookups, library/framework research, best practices discovery, and comprehensive information gathering
- task-distributor: Task orchestration specialist coordinating parallel execution of independent tasks across multiple specialized agents
- test-automator: PROACTIVE test automation specialist - automatically engages when user mentions tests, testing, test automation, test frameworks, test coverage
- toolkit-manager: PROACTIVE meta-agent for analyzing, improving, and managing the agent/skill toolkit itself
- trend-analyst: Trend analysis and forecasting specialist identifying patterns, predicting trajectories, and providing strategic insights

CRITICAL: Return ONLY comma-separated agent names (e.g., agent1,agent2) or NONE if unclear.

STRICT RULES:
- NO explanations, rationales, or reasoning
- NO extra text before or after the agent names
- JUST the comma-separated list, nothing else
- If unclear, return exactly: NONE
